reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Amazing location on the outskirts of town, quiet, you can still walk to all restaurants, cozy family atmosphere, yet private. Room had kitchen to cook at home (nice with the expensive restaurants) and breakfasts were great (eggs, meats, cereal, yogurt, granola, etc). Sauna rocked--best suana ever (steam sauna with eucalyptus). Pick up from train station and excellent service. Will definitely stay again.
reviews.title: amazing view of Matterhorn, ski out easier than ski in

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What a great hotel with a fantastic restaurant! We stayed for 3 nights and that was the perfect amount of time to devote to Zermatt's incredible sights. The hotel is a 15-20 minute walk from the main village and sits on a lovely meadow with a spectacular view of the Matterhorn. The location could not be better! We had a nice double room with a balcony view of the Matterhorn that was simply breathtaking. The Italian family that run the hotel are wonderful people who are always there to help. The restaurant serves up mouth-watering steaks, fish and pasta. Try the Roasted Perch Filets or the Argentian Steak. Wonderful food!! Ask for Dimitri to be your waiter. He is super nice and speaks english quite well. With a an on-site restaurant that was so good, there was no need to walk down the hill to the main village for dinner. The hotel is also very close to the Klein Matterhorn lift. The hotel will pick you up at the main train station and take you up to their spectacular location. You will be blown away by the view!
reviews.title: Hemizeus is Paradise in Zermatt

There was an exciting vibe in the air the street seemed quite lively and was all light up by the outdoor restaurants and shops neon lights....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We took a taxi from outside the station to Hemizeus Aparthotel took about 15mins and was all up hill so it was a good job we invested in the pricey 20CHF it cost. It was dark by this time and our first visit to Zermatt so it was a price that needed to be paid.
reviews.title: Hemizeus - Zermatt. Fantastic hotel in Zermatt.

reviews.text: Hotel was well postioned to the outside of the main street area down a quiet road close to the river. No one was there to greet us on reception but a nice welcome note and our room key was left. We found our room very easily and was very happy with it. We had booked a studio and requested a room with a view...... I have never been more satisfied with a room with a view. The side of our box room was glass with a small balcony looking out onto the valley and a clear undisturbed view of the Matterhorn - It really was breathtaking. You could lie in bed for hours starring out of the window.

Good Views but at end of Town
reviews.text: Would recommend this place to anyone.

Yes the hotel is not in the center of the town, but oh what a great walk it is to the ski lift and on down to the center of town. And the staff was just great, from the minute I walked in to the time I was dropped off at the train station. The staff was welcoming, gracious and so helpfull. They had a great morning breakfast included in the price and their dinner menu was excellent. And then there is the view. From my room ( very spacious with a small kitchen area) I had a great view of the Matterhorn and the hills. As much as I enjoyed Zermatt, it ws this hotel that added that extra..extra. I unequivocally recommend this hotel.
